April 19, 1976 D Pontins Southport (Championship Section)
Pontins Southport (Championship Section) 0 Test Piece Contest Pontins (Southport) - Qualifiers pontins-southport-championship-section Pontins (Championship Section)
Holiday Overture for Brass
Pontins Holiday Centre, Ainsdale Beach, Southport Prizes - 1st £500, 2nd £200, 3rd £100. Programme shows two championship section contests held on 18th and 19th April. 7 bands competed on Sunday 18th, 3 bands on Monday 19th.
May 20, 2013, 7:16 a.m. May 18, 2016, 9:13 a.m.
1 Lockwood Band (Huddersfield) Peter Kitson
2 Slaithwaite Band Peter Wadsworth
3 Westoe Band Ray White
